taskDescription: An electrostatic potential map of (trifluoromethyl)benzene, C6H5CF3, is shown. Would you expect (trifluoromethyl)benzene to be more reactive or less reactive than toluene toward electrophilic substitution? Explain.
detailedSolution: Toluene is more reactive; the trifluoromethyl group is electron-withdrawing.
